programme.subtitle: Thomas and the Pigs
programme.desc: Railway adventures. Farmer Trotter asks Thomas to collect some straw for the piglets, which are soon to be born.
programme.title: Thomas and Friends

programme.subtitle: Socket Sprocket Pocket
programme.desc: Two fluffy alien siblings land on Earth. In this episode, DottyWot's chair is broken and her brother is going to fix it, but he keeps losing his spanner.
programme.title: The WotWots

programme.desc: Animation. While Bobby and Tiffany are away, Max investigates a robbery, a fire and a car accident, unaware that they are just stories written for a school project.
programme.title: City of Friends

programme.desc: Goomo wakes up to think he has ruined all the Jellyberry trees when he finds them all knocked down.
programme.title: Jelly Jamm

programme.subtitle: Bedtime
programme.desc: Animated series about a lovable little pig. It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside then they are called in for their bath.
programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.subtitle: Runny Nose
programme.desc: Hooray, snow! Farm Girl and Piggy want to play snowballs, but first they must clear the snowdrift in front of the castle so that Farmer can go outside.
programme.title: Castle Farm

programme.subtitle: I'm Going to Win the Rosette
programme.desc: Regal larks. It is the castle's annual pet talent contest, and Little Princess is determined to win the golden rosette.
programme.title: Little Princess

programme.subtitle: The Party
programme.desc: Impish animation. Chaos ensues when the twins invite their little friends to the castle for a birthday party.
programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

programme.subtitle: Reptiles
programme.desc: Mr Bump finds Mr Stubborn's swamp tour more than a little testing, while Mr Grumpy and Miss Chatterbox share a decidedly bumpy ride along with some scaly friends.
programme.title: Mr Men

programme.desc: A look ahead to today's children's programmes, including competitions and dedications.

programme.desc: The twins inadvertently ruin Fifi's garden while playing a game. Can they and the other tots make it better before Fifi finds out?

programme.desc: Animation about a lovable young pig. Peppa and George get caught in a thunderstorm.

programme.desc: Prehistoric animation. Igam Ogam and her friends try to avoid having a bath.
